system.description: Non-Relic metal Objects within the Area rust for the duration. Each Turn when you Focus on this Spell, roll a d6 for each Item. On a roll of 1, the Item breaks. If the Item that breaks is larger than Medium, this creates a 1-foot square hole that is 1-foot deep in it.
system.effect: Non-Relic metal Objects within the Area rust for the duration. Each Turn when you Focus on this Spell, roll a d6 for each Item. On a roll of 1, the Item breaks. If the Item that breaks is larger than Medium, this creates a 1-foot square hole that is 1-foot deep in it.
